actionEnableMsgId.Wiki: The text ID to use for the prompt message if this interaction is enabled.

actionFailedMsgId.Wiki: The text ID to use for the prompt message if this interaction fails.

spQualifiedPassEventFlag.AltName: Bypass Qualification Check: Event Flag ID
spQualifiedPassEventFlag.Wiki: The event flag ID that causes the qualification checks to be ignored for this interaction.

validDist.Wiki: The maximum distance at which this interaction can be triggered. In metres.

playerAnimId.Wiki: The player animation to use when this interaction is used by a player.

chrAnimId.Wiki: The player animation to use when this interaction is used by a non-player character.

spQualifiedId.Wiki: The requirements to use this interaction, can either be a EquipParamGoods or SpEffectParam row.\nspQualifiedType determines which type to reference.

spQualifiedId2.Wiki: The requirements to use this interaction, can either be a EquipParamGoods or SpEffectParam row.\nspQualifiedType2 determines which type to reference.

objDummyId.Wiki: The dummy polygon belonging to the attached object for this interaction that determines the 'action' position.

objAnimId.Wiki: The object animation to use when this interaction is used.

validPlayerAngle.Wiki: The usage cone where a player can trigger this interaction (on the player's side). Effective angular difference between the player's orientation vector and the object's orientation vector. In degrees.

spQualifiedType.Wiki: The requirement type to use for spQualifiedID.

spQualifiedType2.Wiki: The requirement type to use for spQualifiedID2.

validObjAngle.Wiki: The usage cone where a player can trigger this interaction (on the object's side). Effective angular difference between the player's orientation vector and the object's orientation vector. In degrees.

chrSorbType.Wiki: How the user character is attracted into the object during usage.

eventKickTiming.Wiki: The timing for the interaction activation.
